00027 class ServicePropertiesException  : public ServiceException
00028 {
00029  public:
00032   ServicePropertiesException(const SimpleString Message, int Err = UnkownSimpleExceptionCode ) : ServiceException( Message, UnkownSimpleExceptionCode ) {};
00033 
00035   virtual ~ServicePropertiesException();
00036 
00037  protected:
00039   virtual SimpleString GetExceptionType() const { return SimpleString("ServicePropertiesException"); };
00040 };

00042 // A container for service properties, will be defined later in this file
00043 class ServiceProperties;
00044 
00056 class ServiceProperty
00057 {
00058 public:
00063     ServiceProperty();
00064 
00072     ServiceProperty( const SimpleString Name, const SimpleString Value = SimpleString::EmptyString );
00073 
00074     virtual ~ServiceProperty();
00075 
00084     void Empty();
00085 
00097     virtual bool SetProperty( const SimpleString Name, const SimpleString Value = SimpleString::EmptyString );  // Set a property with a name and optionaly a value
00098 
00106     virtual bool UpdateProperty( const SimpleString Value );
00107     virtual const SimpleString operator= ( const SimpleString rvalue );
00108     virtual const ServiceProperty& operator= ( const ServiceProperty& rvalue );
00109 
00110     const SimpleString GetValue();
00111     const SimpleString GetName();
00112 
00113 protected:
00114     // Total length of this Property (size included)
00115     unsigned int Length;
00116 
00117     virtual void Copy( const ServiceProperty& rvalue );
00118 
00119     // Name and value
00120     SimpleString Name;
00121     SimpleString Value;
00122 };
00123 
00124 class ServicePropertyNotify : public ServiceProperty
00125 {
00126     // Our container may access our private values
00127     friend class ServiceProperties;
00128 
00129 public:
00130     ServicePropertyNotify();
00131     ServicePropertyNotify(const SimpleString Name, const SimpleString Value = SimpleString::EmptyString, ServiceProperties * Parent = (ServiceProperties*)NULL );
00132     virtual ~ServicePropertyNotify();
00133 
00134     virtual bool SetProperty( const SimpleString Name, const SimpleString Value = SimpleString::EmptyString );
00135     virtual bool UpdateProperty( const SimpleString Value );
00136     virtual const SimpleString operator= ( const SimpleString rvalue );
00137     virtual const ServiceProperty& operator= ( const ServiceProperty& rvalue );
00138     virtual const ServicePropertyNotify& operator= ( const ServicePropertyNotify& rvalue );
00139 
00140     void SetNotify( ServiceProperties * Parent );
00141 
00142 protected:
00143     virtual void Copy( const ServicePropertyNotify& rvalue );
00144 
00145     ServiceProperties * Container;
00146 };
00147 
00148 class ServiceProperties
00149 {
00150 public:
00151     // At first, we have at least 8 possible properties, by default
00152     ServiceProperties( int InitialNumberOfProperties = 8 );
00153     virtual ~ServiceProperties();
00154 
00155     ServiceProperty & GetProperty( int Elem );
00156     ServiceProperty & operator[]( const SimpleString Name );
00157 
00158     // To check if a properties exists
00159     bool IsDefined( const SimpleString Name );
00160     bool Undefine( const SimpleString Name );
00161 
00162     int GetNumberOfProperties() { return NbProperties; }
00163 
00164     int GetTXTRecordLength() const;
00165     const unsigned char * ExportTXTRecord() const;
00166 
00167     operator char*();
00168     operator const char*();
00169     operator unsigned char*();
00170     operator const unsigned char*();
00171 
00172     bool TxtRecordIsFull() const;
00173     bool ImportTXTRecord( int RecordLength, const unsigned char * Record );
00174 
00175     void NotifyChanges();
00176 
00177     void Empty();
00178 
00179     const ServiceProperties& operator=(const ServiceProperties& ToCopy );
00180 
00181 protected:
00182     // according to the DNS-SD specifications, can be up to 8000 bytes
00183     // but not on multicast usage
00184 #ifdef OMISCID_USE_MDNS
00185     enum SizeOfBuffers { MaxTxtRecordSize = 1024 };
00186 #else
00187 #ifdef OMISCID_USE_AVAHI
00188     // For avahi, there is a cookie set in TXT record, so let's say that
00189     // we have 200 characters less
00190     enum SizeOfBuffers { MaxTxtRecordSize = 824 };
00191 #endif
00192 #endif
00193 
00194     virtual int Find( const SimpleString Name, bool ReadOnly = true );
00195 
00196     // Max size of the TXT record field
00197     int TXTRecordLength;
00198     unsigned char TXTRecord[MaxTxtRecordSize];
00199 
00200     int NbProperties;
00201     int MaxProperties;
00202     ServicePropertyNotify * Properties;
00203 };
00204 
00205 } // namespace Omiscid
